title: The Adventures of the Three Princesses
description: Join the three princesses Alli, Olivia, and Marie as they dive into an unexpected hunt for crystals to save their mystical kingdom. The fate of their land, Roller Riffic, rests solely on the success of their quest! Will they find what they are looking for? It will take teamwork, help from an unlikely butterfly, and a lot of courage from three ten year old royals to succeed... An amazing addition to the series is the talent behind all of the adventures! These stories were created within the giggly, writing sleepovers of ten year old girls who had a dream of sharing their art with the world. Be amazed by their stories and talents.
author: Olivia Chaffin
